title: S3 Ep1: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Episode 1 – Rising Daughter
itunes:title: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Episode 1 – Rising Daughter
description:
July 9, 2018 / On March 11, 1985, in a tiny community in Camden County, Georgia, a married couple were gunned down in the entryway of their church. Fifteen years would pass before an arrest was made. But was this a cold case that was finally solved, or a case that still remains unsolved despite the conviction that was obtained. 

Episode scoring music by Blue Dot Sessions, Patrick Cortes, and Chris Zabriskie.

This episode was sponsored by Casper and Parcast – Female Criminals.

www.Casper.com/undisclosed use promo code UNDISCLOSED

www.Parcast.com/Criminals to tune in to the Female Criminals podcast.
